inclusion.criterion: Relapsed or refractory systemic Anaplastic Large Cell Lymphoma (ALCL)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Relapsed or refractory mature T-cell lymphoma to include peripheral T-cell lymphoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adult T-cell lymphoma; Extranodal natural killer (NK)/T-cell lymphoma, nasal type; Enteropathy-type T-cell lymphoma;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hepatosplenic T-cell lymphoma; Subcutaneous panniculitis-like T-cell lymphoma; Angioimmunoblastic T-cell lymphoma.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All patients should have evaluable or measurable disease on entry to study.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Histology confirmed by Laboratory of Pathology, National Cancer Institute (NCI).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Performance Status Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) less than or equal to 2.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Creatinine less than or equal to 1.5 mg/dl or creatinine clearance greater than 50 ml/min for patients at least 18 years.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pediatric patients should have maximum serum creatinine by age as follows: Less than age 7 and less than or equal to age 10 may have a Maximum Serum Creatinine of 1.0 mg/dl; Less than age10 and less than or equal to age 15 may have a Maximum Serum Creatinine of 1.2 mg/dl; Age 15 years or older may have a Maximum Serum Creatinine of 1.5 mg/dl.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Alternatively, pediatric patients should have a creatinine clearance of greater than 50 m1/min/1.73m^2.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Total bilirubin less than 1.5 x upper limit of normal (ULN) (patients with elevation of total bilirubin consistent with Gilbert's disease are eligible providing they have a normal direct bilirubin).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: aspartate aminotransferase (AST) less than or equal to 2.5 x ULN;
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: No active central nervous system (CNS) lymphoma.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients should not have received systemic cytotoxic chemotherapy within 3 weeks of study entry.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is currently experiencing progressive lower extremity weakness and urinary retention. The patient's age and performance status are within the eligible range.
